contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionarypar|PPE}} '''PPE''' may stand for: *[[Chemotherapy-induced acral erythema|Palmoplantar erythrodysesthesia]] syndrome *[[Park Place Entertainment]] (now part of Caesar's Entertainment) *[[European People's Party]] *[[European People's Party (European Parliament group)]] *[[PCBoard]] Program Executable *[[Personal protective equipment]] *[[Philosophy, Politics and Economics]], an academic degree *[[Polyphenyl ether]] *Porcine proliferative enteropathy (see [[enteropathy]]) *[[Power Processor Element]] *[[Property, plant and equipment]] *[[Puerto PeÃ±asco International Airport]], Mexico ==See also== *[[PP&E]], property, plant, and equipment, or fixed assets {{disambig}}
